name: Sample page
description: A sample plugin demonstrating the empty-page template with breadcrumb navigation, title, and description.
author: VerifyWise
detailedDescription:
The Sample Page plugin demonstrates how to create a plugin that adds a custom page to VerifyWise. It showcases:

- Sidebar navigation integration
- Breadcrumb support
- Empty page template usage
- Dynamic content loading via API endpoint

Use this as a starting point for building your own custom pages.

faq.question: How do I create my own custom page?
faq.answer: Copy this plugin's structure and modify the manifest.json to define your page's title, description, and icon. Update the endpoint to point to your custom API route that returns the page content.

faq.question: What templates are available for pages?
faq.answer: Currently, the 'empty-page' template is available, which provides a blank canvas with header. More templates like 'table' and 'dashboard' are planned for future releases.

page.title: Sample plugin page
page.description: This is a sample page created by a plugin to demonstrate the empty-page template.
